name: documentalist
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a person whose job is to collect records relating to a subject of study and to provide information about them: She works as a documentalist at the university. The documentalist should be able to compile a helpful record of what has been published in the relevant field. Related word
document
More examplesFewer examplesA documentalist has to evaluate the relevance of a document to the collection.The documentalist can suggest where to look for the information. Our documentalists operate a system for access to and retrieval of documents from the library.Documentalists usually play a more active role than librarians in analyzing documents.
